name: Tianna Wainwright
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello, my name is Tianna and I believe I would be a great asset to your company. I have a lot of knowledge in the Marijuana industry with 4+ years of experience. I’ve held various different positions:  Inventory specialist, budtending, shift leading and  managing. I’ve worked with small independant dispensaries, to larger franchise shops.  I'm very self-motivated, goal oriented and am always striving to be the best. I am always looking to grow within the company and give 110% to my job.  I also believe that I bring a positive energy along in any situation that I involve myself in. Below I have listed my most relevant positions and I hope that you’ll consider me when making your decision. Thank you and I'll look forward to hearing from you soon.
experience:
H.O.C, Inglewood — Manager 
December 2016 - July 2017

Managed a team of 15+  in a retail environment
Trained new volunteers 
Maintained operational efficiency with proactive oversight and corrections 
Set sales goals and ensured staff met set quotas
Implemented policies and made sure store was running up to company standard. 
Performed inventory twice a week to calculate store retention.
Cash handling upwards of 25k daily
Payroll, paying vendors and intake of all new product 
Recruitment of new volunteers 

Most Wanted Collective, South Central — Budtender 
October 2014- October 2016

Worked 50 hours a weeks
Made deliveries to celebrity clientele
Served patients and provided thorough product knowledge based on specific needs
Maintained a clean environment 
Blunt and joint rolling

Kush n’ Wax Connection, East La — Inventory Specialist
June 2013 - July 2014

Kept log of all product in and out take 
Rolled blunts, joints, cones etc
Provided bud tenders with all necessary products 
Jarred up all concentrates and flower straight from the pound
Kept log of every pound and ounce of wax straight from the vendor 
Nightly and morning inventory count of all products in the shop 
Washing and sanitary maintenance for all smoking supplies
contact: You can contact me via phone: (626) 461-2026 or email: tiannareneew@gmail.com
